sentences.en: Coastal defence is a costly business.

sentences.en: Evelyn Waugh came to Wilson’s defence and acknowledged the brilliance of the book’s themes.

sentences.en: He wanted to conduct his own defence.
sentences.cn: 他想自己为自己辩护。

sentences.en: HMS Warspite was decommissioned as part of defence cuts.
sentences.cn: 作为削减国防开支的一部分，英国皇家海军舰艇“厌战”号宣布退役。

sentences.en: I still prefer to play in defence.
sentences.cn: 我还是更喜欢打防守。

sentences.cn: 辩称他们只是在服从命令站不住脚。

sentences.en: Jokes can be a form of self-defence.

sentences.cn: 利兹放下防备心理，开始放松了。

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, cuts in defence spending forced the aerospace industry to retrench.
sentences.cn: 不久之后，国防开支的削减迫使航空航天业紧缩开支。

sentences.cn: 人体的免疫系统是抵御疾病的主要屏障。

sentences.cn: 土地非常平坦，无法做防卫之用。

sentences.cn: 首相已委任一位平民为国防部长。

sentences.en: There was a general acceptance that the defence budget would shrink.
